examples: If you don't do it now, you'll only regret it.
Si no lo hace ahora, solo se arrepentirá.
The decision could be one he lives to regret.
La decisión podría ser una de la que se arrepienta.
I soon came to regret my action.
Pronto llegué a lamentar mi acción.
‘I've had a wonderful life,’ she said, ‘I don't regret a thing.’
"He tenido una vida maravillosa", dijo, "no me arrepiento de nada".
